channel.title: Comments on: Technology Book Buying Guide: How To Pick a How To Guide
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Elizabeth Pampalone | Guest Post: Deemable Tech
item.dc:creator: Elizabeth Pampalone | Guest Post: Deemable Tech

item.title: By: Ray Hollister
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description: I agree, but I have to admit though, I completely disagree about the For Dummies series. I think they are really helpful and funny, too. Whenever I tackle a new subject I always start with a For Dummies book. I think they are exceptional at writing in plain language and making complex terminology and concepts understandable. Just my 2 cents.
item.content:encoded: I agree, but I have to admit though, I completely disagree about the For Dummies series. I think they are really helpful and funny, too. Whenever I tackle a new subject I always start with a For Dummies book. I think they are exceptional at writing in plain language and making complex terminology and concepts understandable. Just my 2 cents.
